variants.Description in input context: This variant affects protein stability and localization.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the SH-SY5Y cell line.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: reduced protein levels, altered post-translational modifications
Readout description.Result Description: DJ-1 protein levels were significantly reduced in cells carrying the NM_004315.4:c.123A>G variant, exhibiting altered band pattern on western blot.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent cell transfections were performed for each condition.

Technical replicates.Description: Each blot was run with three technical replicates.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA followed by Tukey's post-hoc test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression levels greater than 85% of control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression levels less than 60% of control.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the SH-SY5Y cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Cell viability was significantly reduced in cells carrying the NM_004315.4:c.123A>G variant, as measured by MTT assay.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent cell transfections were performed for each condition.

Technical replicates.Description: Each measurement was performed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Cells treated with neurotrophic factors were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Untreated cells were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell viability greater than 80% of control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Cell viability less than 50% of control.
